body:
Made the following changes:

- [x] Add PyTorch 1.2.0 and `master`
- [x] Add additional variants, dependencies, and conflicts
- [x] Fix environment variables that changed from `NO_*` to `USE_*`
- [x] Force installation to use particular BLAS library
- [x] Add unit tests

I was able to successfully build PyTorch 1.2.0 on macOS 10.14.6 with Clang 10.0.1 with no optional variants enabled. Build worked with OpenBLAS but not with MKL. Still needs a bit of testing, but is probably safe to merge.
title: Overhaul PyTorch package
